job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, bouwen en implementeren van toepassingen voor large language models (LLM) in cloudomgevingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering activities of designing, building, and implementing applications, which is a direct match for this category. The focus on LLM applications places it within the context of AI integration.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg jij ervoor dat AI-oplossingen daadwerkelijk impact maken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes ensuring AI solutions have a real-world impact, which aligns with understanding business needs and strategic goals to deliver value.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en implementeren van AI-gedreven oplossingen met focus op praktische toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions, fitting the definition of building and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van prototypes en deze uitbreiden tot volwaardige toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development lifecycle, from prototyping to full application development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen, evalueren en verbeteren van LLM-uitvoer met geavanceerde meetmethodes
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the output of LLMs, designing, evaluating, and improving it using metrics, which is a core task related to working with and refining models.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen en optimaliseren van AI-modellen voor nauwkeurigheid en betrouwbaarheid
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the process of testing and optimizing AI models, which falls under model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Presenteren en demonstreren van AI-oplossingen aan stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Presenting and demonstrating solutions to stakeholders implies communicating the value and functionality of the AI solutions, linking technical work to business understanding and stakeholder communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met teams in een Agile/Scrum-omgeving
Presenteren en demonstreren van AI-oplossingen aan stakeholders

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software development tasks such as designing, building, implementing applications, and prototyping (5 tasks in Macro-Category A). While there are tasks related to evaluating and optimizing LLM output and models (2 tasks in Macro-Category B), the core focus remains on the engineering and integration of LLM-driven solutions into cloud environments. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where the role is primarily software engineering with AI/ML as a key component of the product.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the core responsibilities and the focus on LLMs, using specific verbs for software engineering tasks. However, it lacks specific technology mentions (e.g., specific LLMs, frameworks, cloud providers), which would have made the classification even more precise. The task distribution clearly leans towards software engineering with AI integration.
